channel.title: CVE Feed for Esri -- Portal for ArcGIS Enterprise Experience Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Esri -- Portal for ArcGIS Enterprise Experience Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-38036|2024-10-04T17:16:24.601Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis%20enterprise%20experience%20builder
item.description: There is a reflected XSS vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS versions 10.9.1, 10.8.1 and 10.7.1 which may allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to create a crafted link which when clicked could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victim’s browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-25701|2024-10-04T17:17:34.464Z -- esri -- portal%20for%20arcgis%20enterprise%20experience%20builder
item.description: There is a stored Cross-site Scripting vulnerability in Esri Portal for ArcGIS Enterprise Experience Builder versions 10.8.1 – 11.1 that may allow a remote, authenticated attacker to create a crafted link that is stored in the Experience Builder Embed widget which when loaded could potentially execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victim’s browser. The privileges required to execute this attack are high. The attack could disclose a privileged token which may result in the attacker gaining full control of the Portal.
